name: Grand Survival Battle
description:
In the slums of Gangster town neighbor, KJ along with his companion Baldie, who are both ruthless and mysterious, the members of the ‘Knights’ gangster group are trying to expand local territory with their iron fist when faced menaced by a rival group to their reign, the journey becomes a fight for personal survival. Grand Survival is the ultimate virtual battle game where the thirst for rival gangster fights between the thugs in the midst of criminal town is fulfilled with great user experience and exciting new features of 2018, which were never introduced before. Fight and kill enemies with hand-to-hand combat, use heavy weapons at disposals like M4, hand pistols, bats and knife to attack, assault and defend the territory. Shoot to kill the gangster in masks and claim the neighborhood by spraying your Gang tattoos on the city walls. Beware of the city cops, an elite group of lawmen who won't be swayed by bribes or fear.

Grand Survival Battle of 2018 is the best action packed simulation game going to be a mighty war with different challenging and unique stages.
Download now to get the real feel as a true criminal gangster shooter hero in this online virtual gun shooting survival game of 2018. This is a thrilling fight game that will let you ​enhance your shooting skills &Gangster fighting skills. Be a part of stealth commando mission gang prove that you’re the best underworld criminal, rifleman & marksman.

Gameplay Features :
* Third Person Hand to Hand Fight & stealth takedowns
* Multiple Guns & Melee Weapons (M4, Pistol, Bat, Knife )
* Wall Spray Tagging ( New Feature )
* Shoot from inside Car while Driving ( New Feature )
* Command your AI companions Shoot/Follow ( New Feature )
* Open World City with collectible items ( Health Juice, Guns, Car Lockpicks, Grenades )
